EmailTemplate.name: Alchemist On-Boarding
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Palmetto!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.X3rd_Party_Sales_Rep__c},
Congratulations on joining Palmetto, youâ€™ve completed your on-boarding documentation!
The next step is to log into Alchemy with your email and password you created. Here is the link to login to Alchemy: https://alchemy.palmetto.com Once you login an automatic pop up will appear with the next steps to complete Alchemy training.
Whether this will be your first time helping a homeowner enjoy the great benefits of solar or if you have been doing this for years, we are here to help you every step of the way, one homeowner at a time.
If you have any questions, contact the Alchemy Success team via the "Chat" feature (green bubble) on the bottom right of your Alchemy platform.
Good luck and happy selling!
The Alchemy Success Team
